'''13w36b''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.2]], released on September 6, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/09/minecraft-snapshot-13w36a/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w36a]] snapshot.

13w36b was reuploaded twice on September 6, 2013. The first time was to fix issues relating to the inventory key<ref name=reupload1>{{tweet|dinner|375965788106391552|Hotfix for the inventory key issues has been pushed out. Close down the game (or launcher) and reopen it.|September 6, 2013}}</ref>
and the second was to roll back control changes.{{more info|what control changes?}}.<ref>{{tweet|dinner|375969324265381888|Rolled back the control changes. Snapshot users, restart your launcher/game and you should have relatively saner controls.|September 6, 2013}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Statistics]]'''
* Added mob statistics.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Armor]], [[bow]]s, [[sword]]s'''
* Can now get the Unbreaking enchantment from enchantment tables.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Pressing the "Super Secret Settings" button plays a random sound with a deeper pitch.
